overview: Tough Tape is a total body workout led by Master Instructor Tracie Long.  It includes a 26-minute high intensity sequence with heavy weights (5-20 pounds) to sustain a fat-burning heart rate, while a variety of exercises circuit through the body.  Use weekly for maximum muscle tone and fat-loss in hips, thighs, chest, back, arms & shoulders.  As you grow lean and shapely, youâ€™ll never outgrow Tough Tape.  Just increase weight sizes.
tagline: It creates a strong, shapely upper and lower body.
title: The Firm Parts - Tough Tape
